title: Gov. Gretchen Whitmer | Trump Says He’s Taking Hydroxychloroquine: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Trump’s claim that he’s taking hydroxychloroquine.

Then, Gov. Gretchen Whitmer talks about the protests against Michigan’s stay-at-home order, the continuing efforts to flatten the curve and the state’s Big Three car manufacturers reopening.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
